name: Deepspace Chaos
description:
Deepspace Chaos

Are you ready to take on the unending forces of the interstellar empire? Fortunately for you, your ship is equipped with a unique Chaos Reactor, allowing you to energize the battlefield with multiple strange and powerful effects.

Survive as long as you can against an increasingly dangerous horde of enemies!

Submitted for GotmJam 5 (Make It Random)
